title: Revenue generated by Rovio Entertainment 2010 to 2018
summary: Overall Revenue in million euros has increased over the Year.
Revenue in million euros is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2014.
The line drastically increased by 2.0 times from Year 2011 to 2012.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
The highest Revenue in million euros, of value 173.5 was reached at Year 2013
Minimum Revenue in million euros about 75.6 was reached at Year 2011
min_summary: In general Revenue in million euros has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million euros is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2014.
